ide.title: IDE Mode
ide.description: Configure the built-in code editor behavior.
ide.auto_save_hint: Automatically save files when switching tabs or losing focus.
ide.agent_description: OxideTerm can deploy a lightweight agent binary to remote hosts for enhanced IDE performance. The agent provides POSIX-native file operations, real-time file watching, and faster search — all running locally on the remote server.
ide.agent_feature_atomic: Atomic file writes (no data loss on network disruption)
ide.agent_feature_watch: Real-time file watching via inotify (instant refresh)
ide.agent_feature_hash: Hash-based conflict detection (prevents overwriting external changes)
ide.agent_feature_search: Server-side grep and deep directory tree loading
ide.agent_supported: Bundled: x86_64, aarch64 (Linux, ~1 MB). Extra: ARMv7, ARM, i686, PowerPC64LE, s390x, RISC-V64, LoongArch64, Android, FreeBSD
ide.agent_auto_hint: When opening IDE mode on supported Linux x86_64/aarch64 hosts, the agent is deployed based on the policy below — you will be prompted to confirm on first use (or deploy automatically if set to 'Always Enable').
ide.agent_extra_hint: For other architectures (ARMv7, RISC-V, LoongArch, etc.), download the binary from GitHub and upload to ~/.oxideterm/oxideterm-agent on the remote host.
ide.agent_path_detail: The agent binary is placed at ~/.oxideterm/oxideterm-agent in the remote user's home directory.
ide.agent_lifecycle_detail: Deployed on first IDE mode open and persists between sessions. Automatically updated when a new version is available. Can be safely deleted at any time — it will be re-deployed when needed.
ide.agent_privacy_detail: The agent is a standalone binary that communicates exclusively with OxideTerm over the existing SSH connection (stdio). It makes no third-party network connections, sends no telemetry, and collects no data.
ide.editor_typography_hint: Override terminal font size and line height for the code editor. Leave empty to follow terminal settings.
ide.font_size_hint: Editor font size in pixels. Empty = follow terminal.
ide.line_height_hint: Editor line spacing. Empty = follow terminal.
ide.agent_mode_hint: Control whether OxideTerm deploys the agent to remote hosts when opening IDE mode.
